stories.text:
A day is 24 hours and we should also spend some time sleeping. How should the valuable time be spent?

We are still pre-product/market fit and launched our MVP.

How much time should be attributed to: 1. Building product/ Talking to users 2. Marketing (website, cold emails, ads, fairs) 3. Fundraising, networking

Michael Seibel said something like 90% should be spent on building the product. Do you agree? What if no-one knows about the product?
stories.title: Ask HN: How should time be spent in a startup pre-product/ market fit?
